subject: Printer not working on 3rd floor
description: User cannot print; driver shows error 0x00000bc4 after a Windows update. Spooler might be stuck.

subject: VPN failing with auth error
description: Several users report VPN auth failures since yesterday. DNS lookups also seem slow. Could be MFA or group policy.

subject: Outlook stuck syncing inbox
description: Outlook profile shows sync errors; OST file may be corrupted. Add-ins enabled for CRM plugin.
